company.name: NEW U THERAPY CENTER & FAMILY SERVICES

description:
Are you a passionate mental health provider? Is work-life balance important to you? Do you want to be part of a strong team of experienced professionals? New U Therapy Center & Family Services, Inc. is the perfect place for you!

We are seeking**Part-time and Full-time Licensed Psychologists**to join our innovative and dynamic teams.

At our California and Florida offices, we have comprehensive programs and multidisciplinary teams of medical providers and therapists dedicated to helping clients live healthy, confident, and fulfilling lives. We provide outpatient services in-clinic and virtually, including: individual, couples, and family therapy; IOP for Mental Health and Co-occurring Disorders; as well as medication evaluation and management. We embrace cutting-edge, evidence-based, and psychedelic treatments. We are a one-stop shop, providing all services under one roof for easy collaboration between professionals.

We have an amazing network of experienced multilingual and multicultural clinicians and clinical supervisors who specialize in various treatments including EMDR, DBT, Eating Disorders, LGBTQIA+, substance use, trauma-informed treatments, and more! Our fast-paced and collaborative environment provides opportunities for expansion as well as personal and professional growth.

New U Therapy Center & Family Services offers therapists the flexibility to work in a hybrid or virtual, private-practice-like environment. Clinicians have the opportunity to design their own work schedules.

Don’t miss this chance to apply and get a $1500 sign-on bonus! * Terms and conditions apply and bonus must be mentioned upon hire.

**Job Types:

**
  • Part-time Licensed Psychologist (20 clinical hrs)
  • Full-time Licensed Psychologist (30 clinical hrs)

**Rates:

**
  • $80-90.00 per clinical hour. Rates may vary based on education and experience

**Full-time and part-time benefits:

**
  • $1500 sign-on bonus
  • Competitive Compensation
  • Performance-based Bonuses
  • Collaborative and Friendly Work Culture
  • 401K with up to 3% matching
  • Credentialing to insurance panels provided
  • Training in private practice
  • Supplemental AFLAC insurance
  • Sick Time Off
  • Monthly company lunches
  • Team-building and culture-building activities
  • Annual corporate in-person events
  • Professional development and trainings
  • Annual CEU reimbursement stipend
  • Access to innovative trainings such as ketamine-assisted therapy and others
  • Full administrative team support

**Additional Full-time benefits:

**
  • 75% Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance Coverage
  • 100% Life Insurance Coverage
  • Six paid holidays
  • Two weeks paid vacation time

**Requirements

**
  • Active CA license
  • Strong demonstrated commitment to professional skills including legal and ethical standards
  • Must be available to work during core business hours Monday through Friday but scheduling is flexible

**Job Types: **Full-time, Part-time

**Schedule:

**
  • Day shift
  • Evening shift
  • Monday to Friday

**Work setting:

**
  • Outpatient
  • Private practice
  • Remote
  • Telehealth

**License/Certification:

**
  • Psychologist license in CA (Preferred)

**Work Location: **CA Remote
